thread.title: BRIEF-Ecology And Environment Awarded Contract With Trust To Conduct Site Investigations Throughout Navajo Nation

title: BRIEF-Ecology And Environment Awarded Contract With Trust To Conduct Site Investigations Throughout Navajo Nation
text:
April 19, 2018 / 6:57 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Ecology And Environment Awarded Contract With Trust To Conduct Site Investigations Throughout Navajo Nation Reuters Staff 
April 19 (Reuters) - Ecology and Environment Inc: 
* ECOLOGY AND ENVIRONMENT, INC. AWARDED CONTRACT WITH TRUST TO CONDUCT SITE INVESTIGATIONS THROUGHOUT NAVAJO NATION 
* ECOLOGY AND ENVIRONMENT INC SAYS HAS BEEN AWARDED A THREE-YEAR, $5 MILLION PLUS CONTRACT WITH PHASE 2 REMOVAL SITE EVALUATION TRUST 
* ECOLOGY AND ENVIRONMENT INC SAYS CONTRACT IS TO CONDUCT SITE INVESTIGATIONS OF ABANDONED URANIUM MINE SITES THROUGHOUT NAVAJO NATION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
